a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Homicide rate vs. GDP per capita, 2021
Homicide rate is measured as the number of intentional homicide deaths per 100,000 people.
Data source: United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (2023), Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
Note: To allow comparisons between countries and over time this metric is age-standardized.
